definition: Mandate of Heaven/the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC/usually written 大運河|大运河[Da4 Yun4 he2]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to move/to transport/to use/to apply/fortune/luck/fate
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
to have a lucky stroke/to try one's luck
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC

sentences.english: With the chance of Universiade, Shenzhen proposes to build a voluntary city with the effort of all citizens.
sentences.chinese: 借大运会契机，深圳提出全民共建“志愿之城”。
因为我们选择了绿色大运。

sentences.english: The Opening Ceremony of the Universiade is in Nanshan District.
sentences.chinese: 大运会开幕式在南山区。

sentences.english: A large complete bottom note LOGO.
What do I need to access to Internet at Dayuncun Foreign Students Dormitory?
sentences.chinese: 大运村留学生公寓正常使用互联网的必备条件有那些？

sentences.english: I believe that the Universiade in Shenzhen will also be a success.
sentences.chinese: 我相信深圳大运会也会很成功。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal joins the Haihe at Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 大运河在天津与海河汇合。

sentences.english: The painting depicts the Grand Canal, Venice, looking north from the Rialto Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画描绘的是从里亚托桥向北望的威尼斯大运河。

sentences.english: The Universiade torch is expected to be lit at the prestigious Qinghua University in Beijing in April.
sentences.chinese: 本次大运会火炬将于4月在北京的清华大学点燃。

sentences.english: More than that, he is a role model: he excels in “managing serendipity”.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，他还是一个“善于把握大运”的榜样呢。

sentences.english: The canal connects Beijing with Hangzhou, 800 miles to the south.
sentences.chinese: 大运河连接北京和南方的杭州，两地相距800英里。

sentences.english: The Beidaihe inland water transportation is extremely developed, it is interlinked with the Beijing-Hangzhou Canal.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河内河运输十分发达，与京杭大运河相通。

sentences.english: Yes, there are only As citizens, what can we do for the Universiade?
sentences.chinese: 那作为市民，我们可以为大运会做点什么呢？

sentences.english: Huang said she and her teachers had been involved in designing the costumes for Universiade guides.
sentences.chinese: 黄秋蓉的同学和老师都曾参与大运引导员制服设计。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal of China enters Shandong from the northwest and leaves on the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 京杭大运河自西北向西南流经山东省。

sentences.english: Wuzhen, , an ancient water town in Zhejiang, lies at the riverside of Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇是浙江的一座古老的水镇，坐落在京杭大运河畔。

definition: thirty-sixth year F12 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1959 or 2019
51st year A3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1974 or 2034
thirty-fifth year E11 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1958 or 2018
the 12 earthly branches 子[zi3], 丑[chou3], 寅[yin2], 卯[mao3], 辰[chen2], 巳[si4], 午[wu3], 未[wei4], 申[shen1], 酉[you3], 戌[xu1], 亥[hai4], used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal numbers I, II etc
to make money
fifty-sixth year F8 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1979 or 2039
horoscope/one's fortune
the 10 heavenly stems 甲[jia3], 乙[yi3], 丙[bing3], 丁[ding1], 戊[wu4], 己[ji3], 庚[geng1], 辛[xin1], 壬[ren2], 癸[gui3], used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal numbers I, II etc
fifty-fifth year E7 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1978 or 2038
third year C3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1986 or 2046
menstruation/woman's period
ninth year I9 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1992 or 2052
thirty-eighth year H2 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1961 or 2021/cf 辛丑條約|辛丑条约, Protocol of Beijing of 1901 ending the 8-nation intervention after the Boxer uprising
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
thirteenth year C1 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1996 or 2056
fifteenth year E3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1998 or 2058
